FM of DPRK Meets British Ambassador
articles.content:
FM of DPRK Meets British Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, October 1 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with British Ambassador e.p. to the DPRK John Everard who paid a courtesy call on him on Monday.
